ISSUE.TITLE: Bug: "How to upgrade?" has outdated link
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Please confirm that the bug report does ***not*** already exist - [x] I confirm there is no existing issue for this bug. ### Steps to reproduce Click on "how to upgrade?" link when an upgrade is available. ### Desired Behavior Link should go to [updated docs](https://docs.nocodb.com/getting-started/self-hosted/upgrading) ### Project Details ``` Node: **v22.14.0** Arch: **x64** Platform: **linux** Docker: **true** RootDB: **pg** PackageVersion: **0.262.4** ``` ### Attachments
